synopsis.text: Re-edited from a 1975 TV series, "Gamba no Bouken" follows the courageous journey of a wild and adventurous mouse named Gamba. When a wounded mouse arrives in Tokyo Harbor from the infamous Devil's Island, he shares harrowing tales of Noroi, a tyrannical white weasel who has subjected the island's mice to unimaginable terror. Fueled by a burning desire to help, Gamba impulsively vows to dethrone Noroi and restore peace. Joined by his loyal friends, Gamba embarks on a daring mission to confront Noroi and liberate the suffering mice from his oppressive rule. This 90-minute movie encapsulates the main events of the series, offering a thrilling and heartwarming tale of bravery and camaraderie.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
